text: 💡 Shifting from curative to preventive care: the future of health is all about being proactive! 🌟 By focusing on populations at risk and utilizing advancements in epidemiology, molecular tools, and genome sequencing, we can create a more accurate picture of individual disease risk. 💼 Polygenic risk scores and other factors can help us estimate the likelihood of developing specific medical conditions. 🌱 It's time to move beyond traditional measures like blood pressure and cholesterol levels! 🔍 Let's embrace a prevention-centered approach to healthcare delivery. 💪
